message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. While I can't go as low as $145, I'm willing to come down a bit to $155. This still gives you a good deal, and it's a price I can work with. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $150. I've already found a similar product from another seller for $150, so I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at $152.50.
